entities.name: Harry Potter
entities.description: The protagonist, an eleven-year-old wizard who survived Voldemort's killing curse as a baby, leaving him with a lightning bolt scar on his forehead. He lives with the Dursleys before discovering he is a wizard and attending Hogwarts.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Vernon Dursley
entities.description: Harry's uncle, a big, beefy man with hardly any neck and a large mustache. Director of Grunnings, a drill-making firm. Proud to be perfectly normal and despises anything strange or magical.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Petunia Dursley
entities.description: Harry's aunt and Lily Potter's sister. Thin and blonde with nearly twice the usual amount of neck. Spends much time spying on neighbors. Pretends she doesn't have a sister and despises magic.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Dudley Dursley
entities.description: Harry's cousin, the Dursleys' spoiled son. Large, pink-faced boy who looks like Uncle Vernon. Very fat and hated exercise. Bullies Harry and is extremely spoiled by his parents.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Albus Dumbledore
entities.description: Headmaster of Hogwarts. Tall, thin, very old wizard with silver hair and beard long enough to tuck into his belt. Wears long robes, purple cloak, and half-moon spectacles. Has a long, crooked nose and twinkling blue eyes. Considered the greatest wizard of modern times.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Minerva McGonagall
entities.description: Tall, black-haired witch in emerald-green robes with a very stern face. Deputy Headmistress of Hogwarts and Head of Gryffindor House. Teaches Transfiguration. Can transform into a tabby cat (Animagus).

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Rubeus Hagrid
entities.description: Keeper of Keys and Grounds at Hogwarts. Almost twice as tall as a normal man and at least five times as wide. Has long tangles of bushy black hair and beard, hands the size of trash can lids. Expelled from Hogwarts in his third year but allowed to stay as gamekeeper.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Lord Voldemort
entities.description: The most powerful Dark wizard in history. Tried to kill Harry Potter as a baby but the curse rebounded, destroying his body. Killed Harry's parents, James and Lily Potter. People are too afraid to say his name.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: James Potter
entities.description: Harry's father. Tall, thin, black-haired man who wore glasses. His hair stuck up at the back. Excellent Quidditch player and Head Boy at Hogwarts. Killed by Voldemort when Harry was a baby.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Lily Potter
entities.description: Harry's mother and Petunia Dursley's sister. Very pretty woman with dark red hair and bright green eyes (same as Harry's). Head Girl at Hogwarts. Died protecting Harry from Voldemort, and her sacrifice left protective magic on Harry.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Ronald Weasley
entities.description: Harry's best friend. Tall, thin, and gangling with freckles, big hands and feet, a long nose, and flaming red hair. Sixth in his family to attend Hogwarts. Comes from a poor but loving wizarding family.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Hermione Granger
entities.description: Harry's friend and the brightest witch of her age. Has lots of bushy brown hair and rather large front teeth. Bossy and know-it-all at first but becomes loyal friend. Extremely studious and talented at magic. Both parents are dentists.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Draco Malfoy
entities.description: Harry's rival at Hogwarts. Pale boy with a pointed face, sleek blond hair, and cold grey eyes. Comes from a wealthy pure-blood family. Arrogant, prejudiced against Muggle-borns, and bullies others. Accompanied by Crabbe and Goyle.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Severus Snape
entities.description: Potions Master and Head of Slytherin House. Has greasy black hair, a hooked nose, and sallow skin. Cold and empty black eyes. Seems to hate Harry and favors Slytherin students. Knows a lot about the Dark Arts.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Quirinus Quirrell
entities.description: Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher. Nervous young man who wears a large purple turban (claimed to be a gift from an African prince). Stutters badly. Classroom smells of garlic. Actually harboring Voldemort on the back of his head under the turban.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Neville Longbottom
entities.description: Round-faced boy who constantly loses his toad Trevor. Clumsy and forgetful, raised by his grandmother. Has an extraordinary number of accidents. Brave despite his nervousness.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Fred Weasley
entities.description: One of Ron's twin brothers. Beater on the Gryffindor Quidditch team. Mischievous and funny, always joking around with his twin George.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: George Weasley
entities.description: One of Ron's twin brothers. Beater on the Gryffindor Quidditch team. Mischievous and funny, always joking around with his twin Fred.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Percy Weasley
entities.description: Ron's older brother, a prefect at Hogwarts. Pompous and rule-abiding, very proud of his prefect status. Wears a shiny red and gold prefect badge.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Oliver Wood
entities.description: Burly fifth-year boy, Captain and Keeper of the Gryffindor Quidditch team. Very passionate about Quidditch and determined to win the House Cup.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Nicolas Flamel
entities.description: Noted alchemist and opera lover, only known maker of the Sorcerer's Stone. Celebrated his 665th birthday recently. Friend and partner of Albus Dumbledore. Lives in Devon with his wife Perenelle.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Sirius Black
entities.description: Lent Hagrid his flying motorcycle to transport baby Harry to the Dursleys. Friend of James Potter.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Argus Filch
entities.description: Hogwarts caretaker. Hates students and loves catching them breaking rules. Owns a cat called Mrs. Norris. Knows the secret passageways better than anyone except the Weasley twins.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Nicholas de Mimsy-Porpington
entities.description: Gryffindor House ghost. Wears a ruff and tights. His head is nearly severed and hangs on a hinge. Resident ghost of Gryffindor Tower.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Peeves
entities.description: Poltergeist at Hogwarts. Little man with wicked dark eyes and a wide mouth. Causes mischief and chaos. Only the Bloody Baron can control him.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
entities.description: A vast castle with many turrets and towers perched atop a high mountain. The premier wizarding school in Britain. Has four houses: Gryffindor, Hufflepuff, Ravenclaw, and Slytherin. Protected by powerful enchantments.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: 4 Privet Drive
entities.description: The Dursley family home in Little Whinging, Surrey. A perfectly normal suburban house where Harry lived in the cupboard under the stairs before attending Hogwarts.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Diagon Alley
entities.description: A cobbled wizarding shopping street in London, hidden from Muggles. Contains shops selling magical supplies including Gringotts bank, Ollivanders wand shop, and various other magical establishments. Accessed through the Leaky Cauldron.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Gringotts Wizarding Bank
entities.description: A snowy white building that towers over other shops in Diagon Alley. The only wizarding bank, run by goblins. Has burnished bronze doors and is hundreds of miles deep under London. Considered the safest place in the world except perhaps Hogwarts. Guarded by dragons and enchantments.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Forbidden Forest
entities.description: A dense, dark forest on the grounds of Hogwarts. Forbidden to students. Home to dangerous creatures including centaurs, unicorns, and other magical beasts.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Platform Nine and Three-Quarters
entities.description: A hidden magical platform at King's Cross station in London. Accessed by walking through the barrier between platforms nine and ten. Where the Hogwarts Express departs from.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Gryffindor House

attributes.ideology: Values bravery, daring, nerve, and chivalry

entities.description: One of the four Hogwarts houses, founded by Godric Gryffindor. House colors are scarlet and gold, symbol is a lion. Known for producing brave wizards. Head of House is Professor McGonagall.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Slytherin House
entities.description: One of the four Hogwarts houses, founded by Salazar Slytherin. House colors are green and silver, symbol is a serpent. Known for producing Dark wizards including Voldemort. Head of House is Professor Snape.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Sorcerer's Stone

attributes.creator: Nicolas Flamel
attributes.magical_properties: Transforms metal into gold, produces Elixir of Life which grants immortality

entities.description: A legendary alchemical substance with astonishing powers. Can transform any metal into pure gold and produces the Elixir of Life. The only Stone in existence belongs to Nicolas Flamel. Hidden at Hogwarts and guarded by various enchantments including Fluffy the three-headed dog.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Invisibility Cloak
entities.description: A silvery-grey cloak that makes the wearer invisible. Belonged to James Potter and was given to Harry by Dumbledore for Christmas. Fluid and strange to the touch, like water woven into material.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Harry Potter's Wand

attributes.creator: Garrick Ollivander
attributes.magical_properties: Holly and phoenix feather, eleven inches, nice and supple. Brother wand to Voldemort's wand (same phoenix feather core)

entities.description: Harry's wand purchased from Ollivanders. Made of holly with a phoenix feather core from Fawkes. The phoenix gave only one other feather, which is in Voldemort's wand.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Nimbus Two Thousand

attributes.magical_properties: High-quality racing broomstick, very fast and responsive

entities.description: A top-of-the-line racing broomstick. Sleek and shiny with a mahogany handle and long tail of neat, straight twigs. Given to Harry by Professor McGonagall for the Gryffindor Quidditch team.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Mirror of Erised

attributes.magical_properties: Shows the deepest, most desperate desire of the viewer's heart
attributes.creator: Unknown

entities.description: A magnificent mirror as high as the ceiling with an ornate gold frame, standing on two clawed feet. Inscription reads 'Erised stra ehru oyt ube cafru oyt on wohsi' (I show not your face but your heart's desire backwards). Used by Dumbledore to protect the Sorcerer's Stone.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Fluffy

attributes.magical_abilities: Enormous size, three heads, falls asleep to music

entities.description: A monstrous three-headed dog that fills the space between ceiling and floor. Owned by Hagrid, borrowed by Dumbledore to guard the trapdoor leading to the Sorcerer's Stone. Falls asleep when music is played.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Norbert
entities.description: A Norwegian Ridgeback dragon hatched from an egg won by Hagrid. Black with spiny wings, long snout, bulging orange eyes. Sent to Romania to Charlie Weasley.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Hedwig
entities.description: Harry's snowy owl, a birthday present from Hagrid. Beautiful white owl with amber eyes. Very loyal and intelligent.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Scabbers
entities.description: Ron's old, fat grey rat. Formerly owned by Percy. Sleeps most of the time and is generally useless.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Wingardium Leviosa
entities.description: A levitation charm that makes objects fly. Taught by Professor Flitwick in first year. Requires proper pronunciation and wand movement.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Alohomora
entities.description: A charm that unlocks doors and windows. Used by Hermione to escape from Filch.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Petrificus Totalus

attributes.effect: Binds the victim's body in a rigid, immobile position

entities.description: A curse that causes the victim's arms to snap to their sides and legs to spring together, making them rigid and unable to move. Used by Hermione on Neville.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Halloween Troll Incident

attributes.outcome: Troll defeated, Harry, Ron, and Hermione become friends

entities.description: A mountain troll was let into Hogwarts on Halloween. Harry and Ron saved Hermione from it in the girls' bathroom, and the three became friends. Later revealed that Quirrell let the troll in as a diversion.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Murder of James and Lily Potter

attributes.outcome: James and Lily killed, Harry survived with a scar, Voldemort's body destroyed

entities.description: Voldemort murdered James and Lily Potter in Godric's Hollow when Harry was a baby. When he tried to kill Harry, the curse rebounded due to Lily's sacrificial protection, destroying Voldemort's body and leaving Harry with a lightning-bolt scar.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: First Quidditch Match: Gryffindor vs Slytherin
entities.description: Harry's first Quidditch match as Seeker. His broomstick was jinxed by Quirrell (though everyone thought it was Snape). Harry caught the Snitch in his mouth after nearly falling off his broom.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

entities.name: Confrontation with Quirrell and Voldemort

attributes.outcome: Quirrell died, Voldemort fled, Sorcerer's Stone destroyed

entities.description: Harry confronted Quirrell in the chamber with the Mirror of Erised. Discovered Voldemort was on the back of Quirrell's head. Harry retrieved the Stone from the mirror and defeated Quirrell through physical contact, which burned Quirrell due to Lily's protective magic.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub
harry_potter_section_01.txt

relationships.description: Harry is the son of James Potter
relationships.evidence: Your father left this in my possession before he died.

relationships.description: Harry is the son of Lily Potter
relationships.evidence: Your mother died to save you.

relationships.description: Petunia is Lily's sister
relationships.evidence: Mrs. Potter was Mrs. Dursley's sister

relationships.description: Vernon is Harry's uncle by marriage
relationships.evidence: It was Uncle Vernon, still purple-faced, still mustached

relationships.description: Dudley is Harry's cousin
relationships.evidence: The Dursleys had a small son called Dudley

relationships.description: Ron and Fred are brothers
relationships.evidence: Ron's twin brothers

relationships.description: Ron and George are brothers
relationships.evidence: Ron's twin brothers

relationships.description: Ron and Percy are brothers
relationships.evidence: Percy the Prefect... Ron's brother

relationships.description: Harry is a member of Gryffindor House
relationships.evidence: better be GRYFFINDOR!

relationships.description: Ron is a member of Gryffindor House
relationships.evidence: the hat had shouted, 'GRYFFINDOR!'

relationships.description: Hermione is a member of Gryffindor House
relationships.evidence: 'GRYFFINDOR!' shouted the hat

relationships.description: Draco is a member of Slytherin House
relationships.evidence: the hat had barely touched his head when it screamed, 'SLYTHERIN!'

relationships.description: Snape is Head of Slytherin House
relationships.evidence: Snape's Head of Slytherin House

relationships.description: McGonagall is Head of Gryffindor House
relationships.evidence: Professor McGonagall was head of Gryffindor House

relationships.description: Harry owns and uses his holly and phoenix feather wand
relationships.evidence: Harry took the wand. He felt a sudden warmth in his fingers.

relationships.description: Harry owns and uses the Invisibility Cloak inherited from his father
relationships.evidence: Your father left this in my possession before he died. It is time it was returned to you.

relationships.description: Harry uses the Nimbus Two Thousand broomstick as Gryffindor Seeker
relationships.evidence: A Nimbus Two Thousand, sir... And it's really thanks to Malfoy here that I've got it

relationships.description: Voldemort killed James Potter
relationships.evidence: I killed your father first, and he put up a courageous fight

relationships.description: Voldemort killed Lily Potter
relationships.evidence: your mother needn't have died â¦ she was trying to protect you

relationships.description: Dumbledore is McGonagall's superior as Headmaster
relationships.evidence: Professor McGonagall was Deputy Headmistress under Dumbledore

relationships.description: Harry and Draco are rivals and enemies
relationships.evidence: I think I can tell who the wrong sort are for myself, thanks

relationships.description: Harry and Voldemort are mortal enemies
relationships.evidence: Voldemort killed my parents, remember?

properties.reason: Voldemort killed Harry's parents and tried to kill Harry

relationships.description: Harry participated in defeating the troll on Halloween
relationships.evidence: Harry and Ron saved Hermione from the mountain troll

relationships.description: Hermione was saved during the troll incident
relationships.evidence: they were looking for me... I went looking for the troll

relationships.description: Harry confronted and defeated Quirrell/Voldemort
relationships.evidence: Harry confronted Quirrell in the chamber and defeated him

relationships.description: Quirrell was defeated and killed in the confrontation
relationships.evidence: Quirrell died after being touched by Harry

relationships.description: Nicolas Flamel created the Sorcerer's Stone
relationships.evidence: Nicolas Flamel is the only known maker of the Sorcerer's Stone

relationships.description: Hermione successfully cast the Levitation Charm
relationships.evidence: Their feather rose off the desk and hovered about four feet above their heads

relationships.description: Hermione used Alohomora to unlock doors
relationships.evidence: She grabbed Harry's wand, tapped the lock, and whispered, 'Alohomora!'

relationships.description: Hermione used the Full Body-Bind curse on Neville
relationships.evidence: Petrificus Totalus! she cried, pointing it at Neville

relationships.description: Harry attends and lives at Hogwarts during the school year
relationships.evidence: Harry Potter arrived at Hogwarts and was sorted into Gryffindor

relationships.description: The Sorcerer's Stone was hidden at Hogwarts
relationships.evidence: It was almost stolen outta Gringotts... That Stone's here fer a good reason

relationships.description: Fluffy guards the trapdoor at Hogwarts
relationships.evidence: Fluffy's a piece o' cake if yeh know how to calm him down

relationships.description: Gringotts bank is located in Diagon Alley
relationships.evidence: They had reached a snowy white building that towered over the other little shops
